column4: Jordan, you can't that I'm aware of..  I have to drag my stuff over all the time...
logging in as root, ssh in as root, all horrible horrible ideas...

There is no reason to EVER su or login as root....  Like someone else said, if you want to login as root you may as well be running windows...  And if you wanted to be running a security infested machine, you'd already be running windows not linux
